org.rapla.mobile.android.utility

Class RaplaConnectorStartupEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rapla.mobile.android.utility.RaplaConnectorStartupEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.rapla.framework.StartupEnvironment

    public class RaplaConnectorStartupEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.rapla.framework.StartupEnvironment
    Startup environment that creates an Facade Object to communicate with an rapla server instance.
